title: Latvia Employment Change
description: Employment in Latvia increased by 0.50 in June of 2022. Employment Change in Latvia averaged -0.04 percent from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3.60 percent in the second quarter of 2021 and a record low of -6.70 percent in the third quarter of 2009. In Latvia, employment change refers to the quarterly change in the number of persons who work for pay or profit, or perform unpaid family work. Estimates include both full-time and part-time employment. This page provides - Latvia Employment Change- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
